summary: The federal government is on an unsustainable fiscal path that poses serious economic, security, and social challenges. We reported that: As of September 30, 2024, publicly held debt was $28.2 trillion, or 98% of the size of the economy Publicly held debt is projected to grow more than twice as fast as the economy, reaching 200% of the size of the economy by 2047 Government...
title: The Nation's Fiscal Health: Strategy Needed as Debt Levels Accelerate
